item.title: What Exactly nullptr Is in C++?
item.description: The answer to “What exactly nullptr is in C++?” would be a piece of cake for experienced C++ eyes & for those who are aware of Modern C++ i.e. keyword. But nullptr is more than just a keyword in C++ & to explain that, I have written this article. But before jump-into it, we will see issues with NULL & then we’ll dive into the unsophisticated implementation of nullptr & some use-cases of nullptr.
